mapper.select: SELECT `timeStr`, `value`, `troubleCode` FROM `simhourdata` WHERE `siteId` = #{siteId} AND `itemId` = #{itemId} AND `value` is not null ORDER BY `time` DESC LIMIT 8

select.foreach: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(`time`,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as `time`,`value`, siteName, itemName, cast(trend as char) as trend, cast(valueUnchanged as char) as valueUnchanged FROM simhourdata WHERE siteId = #{siteId} AND itemName = #{itemName} ORDER BY `time` DESC LIMIT 1
